name: Waldium
long_description: Waldium is creating smarter ways for businesses to create and manage AI-optimized blogs. We are the makers of Blogwald, a modern SaaS platform that focuses on creating content that's discoverable and recommended by AI systems like ChatGPT, Claude, and Google's AI Overviews, while also maintaining traditional SEO optimization. With our AI-powered content creation, multi-tenant architecture, and advanced analytics, businesses can turn their content strategy into a powerful growth engine.
one_liner: Build AI-optimized blogs that rank in AI search results
